entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96253
  • Numerous GlobalizationNative P/Invokes in System.Private.CoreLib.dll don't have a corresponding native function anymore #96251
  • `ConcurrentDictionary.TryGetValue` faster than `Dictionary.TryGetValue` #96250
  • Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks generating consolidation notice when trimming enabled #96249
  • Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x8007000C #96247
  • NaN arithmetic is not consistent with the IEEE 754 standard. #96246
  • Reduced .NET8 R2R performance #96242
  • Blazor WASM Custom debug configs need <DebuggerSupport Condition="''$(Configuration)' == 'DebugCustom'">true</DebuggerSupport> #96239
  • Thread calling CancellationTokenSource.Cancel() continues with another task and after that released task by this thread is never run. #96238
  • UDP Socket.ReceiveFrom with receive timeout and SocketAddress shows inconsistent behavior between Windows and Linux #96237
  • [DataTable] Decimal Column Bug, within parallel #96234

Closed

  • Trim analyzer: Doesn't produce warnings due to annotated generic parameter in various situations #95121
  • Consider changing BBJ_CALLFINALLY/BBJ_ALWAYS representation of call to finally #95355
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: How to get already mapped members when deserializing? #96233
  • Swift into .NET using `CallConvSwift` and `UnmanagedCallersOnly` calling convention #96059
    9.0.0
  • Add a String reverse method #95110
  • Support Tar with large entry size #96209

PullRequests

Created

  • KeyedCollection debug view doesn't work #96261
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add option to disable log message queue behavior (performance issue) #96260
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify Interlocked.And and Interlocked.Or on XARCH #96258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a Codespace for Android development #96257
    area-Meta, os-android
  • [IGNORE] Disable partial sharing on wasm. #96255
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96254
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96248
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wip] [mono] Enable some of the disabled JIT/Directed/callconv/ runtime tests #96243
    needs-area-label
  • Fix missing return in Microsoft.Bcl.TimeProvider's Task.WaitAsync #96240
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [mono][aot] Allow valuetype sharing in wrappers for valuetypes with an explicit l… #96230
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [LoongArch64] change the branch's disasm-format. #96229
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove null check in BasicBlock::SetNext and SetPrev #96228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [ILLink analyzer] Move generic parameter analysis to dataflow #95482
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix crash when processing aliases that do not point at names #96048
    area-System.Text.Json, source-generator
  • Various no-diff cleanups and debugging additions/fixes #96200
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve some BasicBlock asserts #96231
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce use of madvise DODUMP/DONTDUMP #95643
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Console.Unix: fix ANSI colors over redirected standard output. #95654
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix ProcessWaitingTests.WaitChain and ProcessWaitingTests.Wa… #96187
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement, community-contribution, arch-riscv, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Simplify codegen for div/mod #96068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Updated

  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsPrimitive #96226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump and fix missing DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader export #96121
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #93043
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add LoongArch64's SIMD128/256 instructions within emitter. #95456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • New exception handling diagnostic fixes #96065
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Allow preinitializing `AppContext.TryGetSwitch` #95948
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Replaced string concatenation by StringBuilder usage #95760
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64: Add IF_SVE_DT_3A, IF_SVE_DU_3A, IF_SVE_DX_3A, IF_SVE_DY_3A #96201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [wasm] Enable more MT PLinq areas #96215
    area-System.Linq.Parallel
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip after AOT compilation for library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add Arm64 encodings for SVE IF_SVE_CQ_4A_A & IF_SVE_GE_4A group #96214
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Precise reflection-visible delegate target analysis #96166
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix bug in label printing in disasm #96136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
